info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield, northern Westchester and eastern Putnam Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ridgefield, or 8 miles north of New Canaan, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Danbury, New Canaan, Brewster, Ridgefield, Wilton, Bedford, Golden`s Bridge and Peach Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
